question: You saw an advertisement in the paper for a property management position at an apartment complex. Write a letter to express your interest.Include:Why you are writingYour suitability for the roleHow you would approach the position
text: I am writing this, with regard to the vacancy advertisement that I read in the Sunday Observer, on the 24th of February 2022, and I am interested in applying for the post of Property Manager in your esteemed company.

To begin with, let me give some details of my experience in the relevant field. Currently, I am working in a well-known shopping complex in Colombo as a property supervisor, and I have worked here for almost 10 years. I have a clear track record of being an appreciated employee over the years, and recently, I have been nominated for  employee of the year. Moreover, I have completed my MBA recently, so I hope I am a suitable successor for the position.

If get selected for the mentioned position, I would love to examine the current procedures of the apartment company, and after that, I can see what are the changes or improvements that I can do to offer better services to the customers to widespread the good name of the company.
I look forward to hearing from you.
